paragraph.value: As expected, Table 4 shows that people with less domain knowledge are
deceived. Specifically, non-CS human judges fail at
of the 1-to-1 sets for the same titles, which suggests that most of our system generated abstracts follow correct grammar and consistent writing style. Domain experts fail on
sets, mostly because the human written abstracts in those sets don't seem very
. Additionally, the more abstracts that we provided to human judges, the easier it is to conceal the system generated abstract amongst human generated ones.
